name: Delphox
description: It gazes into the flame at the tip of its branch to achieve a focused state, which allows it to see into the future.

abilities.name: Blaze
abilities.effect: When this Pokémon has 1/3 or less of its HP remaining, its fire-type moves inflict 1.5× as much regular damage.
abilities.description: Ups FIRE moves in a pinch.

abilities.name: Magician
abilities.effect: Steals the target's held item when the bearer uses a damaging move.
abilities.description: The Pokémon steals the held item of a Pokémon it hits with a move.
